name: The Papers
description:
There's 3 ending, find all of them if you love lore, and discover the story behind the guy on the desk. The gameplay it's just about 3 - 5 minute, it's really short to be honest. I don't want to talk to much and ruin all of the experience, soo hope you enjoy.

From Developer

The Papers is a really  simple horror games, and my first games too, made in just 1 week, I hope you like it :)

let me know if you face any problem on downloading or you find any bugs in game
